translations.translation: Shall man then have whatever he covets?
Can ever man get what he desires?
Does man imagine that whatever he wishes for is right for him?
Can the human being have whatever he wishes?
What! Will man get whatever he dreams of?
Or shall man have what he wishes
Or shall man have what he wishes?
Or shall man have whatever he fancies?
Or shall man have what he coveteth?
Shall man have whatever he craves?
Shall man have whatsoever he wisheth for!
Shall man have whatever he yearns for?
Nay, shall man have (just) anything he hankers after?
Or shall man have what he wishes?
Is the human to have whatever he fancies?
Or is the human being to have whatever he desires?
Or is there for man whatever he wishes?
[53:24] Or shall man, that is, shall every human being among them, have whatever he wishes for?, such as [their wish] that the idols intercede for them. [No!] It is not so.
(Or shall man) the people of Mecca (have what he coveteth) i.e. that the idols and angels will intercede for them?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: أتطمعون الشفاعة من تلك الآلهة الهلكى، وتأملون معاونتهم ومظاهرتهم إياكم أيها الحمقى؟! { أَمْ } تعتقدون أن يحصل { لِلإِنسَانِ } جميع { مَا تَمَنَّىٰ } [النجم: 24] وتأمل من اللذات والشهوات

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ أم للإِنسان ما تمنَّى }
 " أم ": منقطعة، والهمزة للإنكار، أي: ليس للإنسان كل ما يتمناه وتشتهيه نفسُه من الأمور التي من جملتها أطماعهم الفارغة في شفاعة الآلهة ونظائرها، كقول بعضهم:
